author: gtully
msg: resolve intermittent hang of JDBCQueueMasterSlaveTest - shutdown of the executor used to check the db lock during shutdown may cause the shutdown thread to interrupt and die before shutdown is complete. A wait for shutdown to complete can hang forever. Just cancelling the periodic tasks is sufficient
